Title: Provides a tax credit for the purchase or conversion of an electric vessel or zero emission vessel and provides a tax credit for electric vessel recharging property
Summary: Provides a tax credit for the purchase or conversion of an electric vessel or zero emission vessel; provides a tax credit for electric vessel recharging property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit for the purchase or conversion of an electric vessel or zero emission vessel; and to providing a tax credit for electric vessel recharging property
